reviewText: This is a Russian thriller-detective story about an airplane with a large amount of money being delivered to a group of workers located deep in the tundra. The pilot is forced to make an emergency landing on the bank of a river in an almost uninhabited part of Siberia. The captain of a passing river boat discovers the bodies of the plane's passengers, and realizes they were murdered by someone and the money has disappered. He undertakes to solve the mystery of human greed, murder, betrayal. Very thrilling detective story.
